title: Straight Outta Jahiliyyah: NEW talk by Shaykh Zahir Mahmood & Special Visit by President of Masjid al Aqsa!
desc: Al Buruj Press presents ? ?? Shaykh Omar Awadullah Kiswani, President of Masjid al-Aqsa (1st Qiblah in Islam), Highest Authority of the Mosque. What inspired the Sahaba? What inspired the early generations? What inspired the likes of the great Salahuddin (as) and countless others throughout history? What inspires great men and women to serve in these testing times? ?Join us for this NEW talk delivered by SHAYKH ZAHIR MAHMOOD for the 1st time ever in London! ? ?Shaykh Zahir Mahmood will be the 1st speaker to open the conference followed by the President of Masjid al-Aqsa. There will be no external presentations. We request you come on time not to miss Shaykh Zahir Mahmood?s new talk!? ? Friday?27th November 2015 ?6:30pm-9pm (Doors open from 5:30pm) ?Waterlily?Banqueting Hall, Cleveland Hall, 69-89 Mile End Road, E1 4TT
